response.overview: Follow the exploits of three single women, all friends in various stages of dating in New York City. Ella, a sheltered, newly divorced housewife forced to start over, seeks a new identity and a husband if she can find one. Jenna, a successful city girl with her own internal battles, finds comfort in her demanding career while her multiple suitors and relationships take a back seat. And Janet, while emotionally intelligent and grounded, still struggles with moving on after a failed marriage. When she finally does, everything changes, setting this group of friends on a wild, exhilarating ride in a race against time as they learn about taking chances, falling, and getting back up.
response.title: Friendly Distractions
